name: v1.28.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Add vpc_endpoints attributes by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/571
* Add Elastic IP attributes by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/572
* s3_bucket - fixed documentation for prefix in have_lifecycle_rule by @anjo-swe in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/573
* Make 'vpc_endponts have_subnet' testable by name by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/574
* Make vpn_gateway searchable by name by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/575

## New Contributors
* @anjo-swe made their first contribution in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/573

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/compare/v1.28.1...v1.28.2

name: v1.28.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix vpc_endpoints document by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/569
* Allow Tags of CloudFormation Stack by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/570


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/compare/v1.28.0...v1.28.1

name: v1.28.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/compare/v1.27.1...v1.28.0

name: v1.27.0
body:

name: v1.26.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Use parallel.gem by @k1LoW in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/557
* Add transfer_server type by @andoniaf in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/558
* Make vpc_endpoint searchable by name by @alpineriveredge in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/561
* require octorelease when not CI by @k1LoW in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/562

## New Contributors
* @andoniaf made their first contribution in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/558
* @alpineriveredge made their first contribution in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/561

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/compare/v1.25.2...v1.26.0

name: v1.25.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Support Ruby 3.0.x by @k1LoW in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/554
* Support Ruby 3.1.x by @k1LoW in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/555
* Update rubocop by @k1LoW in https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/556


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/compare/v1.25.1...v1.25.2

* [Feature/metric filter pattern support](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/544)
* [Feature/issue 407](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/543)
* [refactor: faster EC2 instance search](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/535)
* [Update rubocop](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/542)
* [Use GitHub Actions](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/541)
* [Fixed a bug when a bucket was placed in us-east-1](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/533)

* [Replace URI.decode with URI.decode_www_form_component](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/530)
* [Add support for S3 bucket location](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/529)

* [Adding policy text to ecr_repository model.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/520)
* [Add type cognito identity pool](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/519)
* [Add type cognito user pool](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/518)

name: v1.18.5
body:
- [Fix API Gateway test failure if more that 25 APIs in API Gateway](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/506)
- [Added ALB existence checking](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/503)

* [Fix the broken links in contributing.md](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/491)
* [Add Rake task to generate docs](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/489)
* [Fix the bug that have_record_set passes tests in non-existent route53 record](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/490)
* [Add failover parameter check and bit fixed non-failing tests](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/485)

name: v1.18.0
body:
- [Add secrets manager](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/484)
- [Patches for RouteTable, CloudWatchLogs and CloudTrail resources](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/483)
- [Pr explain usage of terraform outputs](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/478) 
- [has_tag for ALB](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/472)

* [Fix a typo in README](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/466)
* [(ref #390) Add support name for nat_gateway](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/465)

* [Support for testing a record set without a record value](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/461)
* [CI against Ruby 2.6](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/462)

* [Fix/spelling](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/456)
* [Marking issue 445 tests as pending](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/454)
* [Add tag support to nat gateways](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/455)

* [Support for testing absence of inline policies](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/449)
* [Remove unused variables](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/447)

* [Add have_server_side_encryption matcher to s3_bucket](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/446)
* [Using rescue to hold AWS::SNS::Client exception](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/444)
* [Add type codedeploy and codedeploy_deployment_group](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/441)
* [Fixes for issue #434](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/438)

* [Bugfix/no method error](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/430)
* [Add redshift and its cluster parameter group resource types.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/435)
* [Ignore AWS managed keys when generating KMS spec files](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/433)
* [Add {alb,nlb}-listener generator by vpc_id.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/432)
* [Add type launch template](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/429)
* [Fix CI](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/431)
* [Add have_nlb_target_group to generator for autoscaling_group ](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/427)
* [(ref #206 )Add tag description](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/424)
* [Add generator for autoscaling_group](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/425)
* [Add have_vpc_attribute.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/420)
* [Adding tag matching support for SQS](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/418)
* [Fixed bug with Awspec::Type::SnsTopic subscriptions method](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/408)

* [Add have_nlb_target_group to generator for autoscaling_group ](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/427)
* [(ref #206 )Add tag description](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/424)

* [Adding tag matching support for SQS](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/418)
* [Fixed bug with Awspec::Type::SnsTopic subscriptions method](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/408)
* [(ref #414) Domain Name and ARN Support for acm](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/415)

* [Feature/sns resource type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/403)
* [Add ec2_credit_specification](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/404)
* [Updated documentation regarding Awspec::DuplicatedResourceTypeError](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/402)
* [adds support for emr](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/395)
* [(ref #392) Change generate cloudwatch_logs](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/399)
* [Fixed typo in the code](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/398)
* [Fixed typo in stub for DynamoDB table](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/400)
* [(ref #392) Add multiple log_streams](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/393)
* [adds eks cluster resource](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/391)
* [Add feature batch](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/388)
* [Bug fixes](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/386)

* [Add feature apigateway](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/380)

* [Add generator for lifecycle rule](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/364)
* [Add generate for db_parameter_group and option group](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/363)
* [Fix FrozenError on route53_hosted_zone.has_record_set](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/362)

* [fixed typo](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/348)

name: v1.3.0
body:
- [Add nlb_* resource types](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/346)
- [Add DB Parameter Group and DB Cluster Parameter Group Generator](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/347)
* [Added function to count routes in a route table.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/342)

* [Add CAA record support in route53_hosted_zone](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/335)
* [Security group permissions check for VPC endpoint prefix list](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/334)

* [Add cluster-name for ecs service test.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/330)
* [Bump awsecrets version to latest (1.14.0)](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/329)

* [Fix Awspec::Helper::Finder::Alb filter](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/320)
* [Change Awspec::Type::IamRole#id from role_id to role_name](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/317)
* [Update aws-sdk to 2.10.x](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/315)
* [Fix route53_hosted_zone resource type when record_sets has multiple TTLs](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/314)

* [Fix the problem where have_ec2 return true always when autoscaling_group has instances](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/311)
* [Add `have_alb_target_group` to autoscaling_group](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/310)

* [Add `have_rule` matcher to alb_listener](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/309)
* [Add `belong_to_vpc` matcher to alb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/308)
* [Add alb_target_group resource type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/307)

* [Fix resource type ( `#id` should use memonized param )](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/306)
* [Add alb_listener resource type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/305)
* [Add `have_subnet` support for alb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/304)

* [Issue #296 - Allow testing tags on AMIs](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/297)
* [Make sure `shared_context: region` is documented somewhere](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/295)

* [Fix issue of security group check in elb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/290)
* [Fix issue of security group check in alb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/289)
* [Update aws-sdk to 2.9.28](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/288)
* [Fix build](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/287)

* [fixed duplicated resource type error.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/284)
* [Add some matcher for autoscaling_group and launch_configuration resource](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/283)

* [Fix route checks to only match correct target](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/261)
* [Honor http_proxy/https_proxy environment variables](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/260)

* [Refactor internal architecture / Add Account and attribute testing API](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/243)
* [Add CloudWatch Logs Resouce type.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/247)
* [Update aws-sdk-ruby to 2.8.*](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/246)

- [Add rerouce matcher 'have_iam_instance_profile' and Update Document.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/240)
- [Update aws-sdk-ruby to 2.7.*](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/238)
- [Fix for ELB has_security_group? tag match logic ](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/236)

- [`be_attaced_to` should not have default device_index](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/235)
- [Added `have_network_interface()` support for ec2](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/234)
- [Support for testing security group settings with targets in other accounts](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/221)
- [Add support for matching on s3 bucket lifecycle rules](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/219)

- [Use Aws::S3::Errors::ServiceError](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/209)

AWS Athena query results bucket has no ACL, no Policy

```
describe s3_bucket('aws-athena-query-results-1234567890-us-east-1') do
  it { should exist }
end
```
- [Fix for issue 201. Raises exception on duplicate instances.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/202)

- [Update aws-sdk-ruby to 2.6.*](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/199)
- [Generate spec `have_policy` (S3 bucket policy) when `awspec generate s3_bucket`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/198)
- [Adding code and documentation to allow for tags on auto scaling groups](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/194)
- [Add ability to search for network interface by name](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/191)
- [Fix awspec generate security_group doesn't return rules with security group ids when allow ALL Traffic](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/178)

- [Add resource cloudwatch_event](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/172)
- [Update README about key/secrets precedence](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/173)
- [Update aws-sdk-ruby to 2.5.6](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/171)

- [Add CloudTrail support to check if logging is enabled.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/164)
- [Fix documentation.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/163)

- [Set aws_resource Aws::IAM::User to iam_role type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/143)
- [Set aws_resource Aws::IAM::User to iam_group type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/142)
- [Set aws_resource Aws::IAM::User to iam_user type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/141)

- [Show thor error when "awspec [resource_name]" was called with no arguments](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/129)
- [Fix typo.](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/128)
- [Add command `awspec generate lambda`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/127)
- [Refactor Awspec::Type::\* and Awspec::Helper::Finder::*](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/126)
- [Remove ec2 resource type syntax sugar](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/125)
- [Add Awspec::Helper::Type.deprecate_resource_type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/124)
- [Add Awspec::DuplicatedResourceTypeError](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/123)

- [Set `aws_resource Aws::RDS::DBInstance` to rds type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/106)
- [Add `Awspec::Type::*#resource` ( for Advanced use )](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/105)
- [Memonize Aws::_::Client instance at Awspec::Helper::Finder._client](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/104)

- [chmod +x exe/awspec](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/103)
- [Fix awspec.gemspec miss](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/102)
- [Reposition bindir, and resurrect console and setup](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/101)

- [Update at Fukuoka.rb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/100)
  - Create the basis for using `Aws::Resources::Resource` by @udzura
- [Fix route53_hosted_zone have_record_set() error when more than 100 record_sets](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/98)

- [Support "IAM Roles for EC2" with secrets.yml](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/94)
- [Add logo](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/91)
- [Add examples of `S3Bucket#has_cors_rule?`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/89)
- [Handle an uri as key of a grantee in `s3_bucket.have_acl_grant()`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/88)
- [Enable to write S3 Bucket Policy specs readably](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/87)

- [Add `have_cors_rule?` and `cors_rules_count` to type `s3_bucket`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/86)
- [Add matcher `have_policy?` to type `s3_bucket`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/85)
- [Add command `awspec generate s3_bucket`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/84)
- [Rename resource type `s3` -> `s3_bucket`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/83)
- [Add command `awspec generate ebs`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/82)

- [Add `have_acl_grant()` `its(:acl_grants_count)` `its(:acl_owner)` to s3 type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/79)
- [Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/80)
- [Update "Resource Type" document](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/78)

- [Generate `describe security_group(my-security-group-name) }` when exec `awspec generate security_group [vpc_id]`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/56)
- [Add command `awspec --version`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/55)

- [Add `Awspec::Type::Base#inspect` method to format error message ](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/51)
- [Add cloudwatch_alarm type](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/50)

Add toolbox commands for awspec contributor.

```
$ bundle exec lib/awspec/bin/toolbox
```
- [Add resource type template generator](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/29)
- [Refactor docgen.rb](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/28)

- [Generate `it { should have_ebs('my-volume') }` when exec `awspec generate ec2 [vpc_id]`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/27)
- [Add command `awspec generate elb`](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec/pull/26)
